item.description: ahoy - i’m josh i’m a security researcher based in ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡¿ with a focus on cybercrime some of my published work can be found below; bebop - a discovery framework for de-anonymising hidden services urlgen - search and uncover data faster with a search enine overlay transl8 - a syntax translator and query generator for network engines multisocks - a scalable relay overlay for high-demand tor crawlers statuspage - the underground statuspage ransomwatch - the open ransomware claim tracker securitytools - a curated set of tools I reccomend for the cyber bot tarpits: honey.
